# 实证结果

\begin{landscape}
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,results='asis'}

fn_state <- c("China", "India", "Pakistan", "Bangladesh", "Nepal", "Sri Lanka", "Maldives", "Bhutan", "Laos", "Myanmar", "Cambodia", "Australia", "New Zealand", "Papua New Guinea", "Palau", "Kiribati", "Maldives", "Nauru", "New Caledonia", "Vanuatu", "Samoa", "Marshall Islands", "Thailand", "Malaysia", "Indonesia", "Philippines", "Singapore", "Vietnam", "Brunei", "Japan", "South Korea", "Hong Kong", "USA", "Macao", "UK", "France", "Germany", "Spain", "Italy", "Canada", "Netherlands")

fn_data <- tw_data |> 
  filter(Year < 2003, Year >= 1990, State %in% fn_state) |> 
  rename(政策干预 = Treat, 出口占比 = ExpPerc)

# vcovHC.plm

reg1.1 <- plm(出口占比 ~ 政策干预, data = fn_data, effect = "twoways", model="within", index =  c("State", "Year"))
rse1.1 <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(reg1.1)))

reg1.2 <- plm(InpPerc ~ Treat, data = fn_data, effect = "twoways", model="within", index =  c("State", "Year"))
rse1.2 <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(reg1.2, cluster = "group")))

reg1.3 <- plm(FDIPerc ~ Treat, data = fn_data, effect = "twoways", model="within", index =  c("State", "Year"))
rse1.3 <- sqrt(diag(vcovHC(reg1.3)))

reg1.4 <- plm(ExpPerc ~ Treat + WTO_Y_IN_TW_IN + duDiplomatic + Diplomatic + APEC + Chinese + ECFA + FTA + Openness + LPop + LGDP, data = fn_data, effect = "twoways", model="within", index= c("State", "Year"))

reg2.3 <- plm(ExpPerc ~ Treat + y1990 + y1991 + y1992 + y1993 + y1994 + y1995 + y1996 + y1997 + y1998 + y1999 + y2000 + y2001 + WTO_Y_IN_TW_IN + y2002 + duDiplomatic + Diplomatic + APEC + Chinese + ECFA + FTA + Openness + LPop + LGDP, data = fn_data, index= c("State"))

```
\end{landscape}
